table.name: vtiger_projectsubtask
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_projectsubtask` ( `projectsubtaskid` int(11) NOT NULL, `projectsubtaskname` varchar(255) default NULL, `projectsubtask_no` varchar(100) default NULL, `projectsubtasktype` varchar(100) default NULL, `projectsubtaskpriority` varchar(100) default NULL, `projectsubtaskprogress` varchar(100) default NULL, `projectsubtaskhours` varchar(255) default NULL, `startdate` date default NULL, `enddate` date default NULL, `projecttaskid` varchar(100) default NULL, `projectsubtasknumber` int(11) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`projectsubtaskid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_projectsubtaskcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_projectsubtaskcf` ( `projectsubtaskid` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`projectsubtaskid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
